name: 黃有評
objective:
機率空間；組合分析；隨機變數；期望值與慣矩；聯合分佈隨機變數；慣矩母函數及特徵函數；大數法則及中央極限定理；隨機漫步及帕森程序。
Our key aim of probability is to develop the ability for students to construct and analyze probabilistic models in a manner that combines intuitive understanding and mathematical precision.
schedule:
1.Introduction
2~3.Sample space and probability
4~5.Discrete random variables
6~7.General random variables
8.Mid-term exam.
9~11.Further topics on random variables
12~13.The Bernoilli and Poisson processes
14~15.Morkov chains
16~17.Limit theormes
18.Final exam.
materials:
textbook:
D.P. Bertsekas and J.N. Tsitsiklis, Introduction to Probability, Athena Scientific, Belmont, MA. 全華圖書代理
